articles.description: The Sooners capped off a strong month with another win over a top-10 opponent Saturday against Alabama
articles.content: An historic month for Oklahoma basketball -- with wins over four top-10 teams, the most by a team in nearly 50 years -- culminated Saturday with a 66-61 home win over No. 9 Alabama. Now the Sooners' … [+1445 chars]
